resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete all notes?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this note?\nThis action cannot be undone.

Created by Saad Husain. Special thanks to my friend Usman Khan for designing the app icon!\n\nThis app was made with the help of the Lynda.com course titled \'Building a Note-Taking App for Android\' by David Gassner.
